name: Cliff Flip Diving: Swimming Simulator
description:
Join funny diving championship, perform stunts and collect all awards with Cliff Flip Diving: Swimming Simulator!

Have you ever dream about cliff-jumping? Now you can get such experience without leaving your room! Check Cliff Flip Diving: Swimming Simulator – hurl, whirl, flip and have fun!

Choose your diver – a pro athlete, old fart or even ordinary clerk - then choose the cliff and jump! Perform varies tricks and stunts during the jump - hurl, swirl and flip! Try to perform all tricks without mistakes – do your best to earn maximum points! The more correctly you perform tricks, the more points you earn. Use earned points to unlock new cliffs or other high places to jump down, new stunts and even new jumpers!

Cliff Flip Diving: Swimming Simulator features:
Unusual cliff-diving tournament simulator
Wide range of stunts and tricks to perform
Unlockable places to jump from - trees, towers, lighthouse and other
Different jumpers – from pro athlete to ordinary old fart

Dive from the cliff to the warm waters of the bay, perform tricks and stunts, earn points and have fun with our new cliff jumping simulator game!
